subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: It was a stellar performance for Rick DiPietro, who had missed 10 games with postconcussion symptoms. DiPietro made 32 saves in victory that evened their quarterfinal series, 1-1.
snippet: It was a stellar performance for Rick DiPietro, who had missed 10 games with postconcussion symptoms. DiPietro made 32 saves in victory that evened their quarterfinal series, 1-1.
